title: Lift Maintenance Schedule
details:
This is to inform all residents that routine lift maintenance will be carried out in all towers on January 18, 2026, from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM.

During this period, lifts will be operational on a rotational basis (one lift at a time per tower).

We regret any inconvenience caused and request your cooperation.

Thank you,
Maintenance Team
